product_name: Built One Bottle Holiday Wine Tote
long_description: Featuring holiday colors and designs, the innovative One Bottle Holiday Wine Tote from Built helps protect your special wine and provides stylish bottle transport to your party destination. Thick, richly patterned neoprene rubber construction protects one 750ml or 1-liter bottle during transport and insulates to help keep bottle cool. Built-in handle is easy to carry and keeps bottle upright. At a picnic or casual event, you can roll down the sides and serve right from tote. The Built One Bottle Holiday Wine Tote folds flat for easy storage when empty; makes a great gift, too!
short_description: Featuring holiday colors and designs, the innovative One Bottle Holiday Wine Tote from Built helps protect your special wine and provides stylish bottle transport to your party destination.
